lines.text: I'd give every cent I've got to be a millionaire.
When Steven doesn't like what I wear, I take it off!
Do you want me to spit in Crystal's eye for you?
Kay nods "No."
You're passing up a big chance, 'cause where I spit no grass grows ever.
I've had a whole year to grow claws, Lexy... Jungle Red!
There's no business like show business, honey. when you're out there in those $880 seats. With a sable wrap over your shoulder and your car and driver waiting at the curb.
One of these days I'm gonna have bathroom the size of Radio City Music Hall!
Whoever gets that dirty?
At least he sent you roses! I had one guy send one lily with a black ribbon around it!
I had another bad dream, can I get in bed with you?
Of course you may.
[Debbie climbs in]
There, is that better?
This is the only good thing about divorce, you get to sleep with your mother.
What makes people fall out of love?
I don't know, some people just change.
Could you ever fall out of love with me?
Oh no, this is different.
I don't think I should go away with you, Mother, but please don't think it's because I fell out of love with you.
